Increased Connectivity: Left M1: with the pre- and post-central gyri bi-laterally, including right secondary somatosensory cortex.Right M1: with ipsilateral supramarginal gyrus and pre- and post-central gyri.
Decreased Connectivity: Left M1: with the left parahippocampal gyrus, cuneus and lingual gyrus.

Increased Connectivity: Bilateral GP: with bilateral pre- and post-central gyri (medial portion), bilateral thalamus and the head of the caudate nucleus.
Decreased Connectivity: Bilateral GP: with the body of the caudate nucleus and cerebellum.Right GP: with bilateral occipital lobe and right parahippocampal gyrus.
